alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 13 at 3:04PM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TUESDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southerly winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County and the Chinle Valley. * WHEN...From 2 PM Tuesday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds will move loose debris and may damage trees and cause spotty power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow above 5500-6000 feet is likely from late Tuesday night into Wednesday morning. These conditions will result in periods of significantly reduced visibility on roads and hazardous travel in this time period.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County
